definition: to impede the motion of, as with a chain or a burden, a dance performed while wearing shoes with wooden soles
details:
verb
- to impede the motion of, as with a chain or a burden
= example: to impede the motion of, as with a chain or a burden
- to become or cause to become obstructed
= example: to become or cause to become obstructed
= synonyms: foul, choke, back up, choke off, clog up, congest
- to dance a clog dance
= example: to dance a clog dance
- to fill to excess so that function is impaired
= example: to fill to excess so that function is impaired
= synonyms: overload
- to coalesce or unite in a mass
= synonyms: clot
- to impede with a clog or as if with a clog
= example: to impede with a clog or as if with a clog
= synonyms: constipate
noun
- a dance performed while wearing shoes with wooden soles
= synonyms: clog dance
- any object that acts as a hindrance or obstruction
- footwear usually with wooden soles
= synonyms: geta, patten, sabot
